name: rectangle-generator
description: For generating rectangle impulses with different frequency

scripts.run-test: export FREQ=1 && export POSITION=2 && node index.js
scripts.autorun-test: export FREQ=1 && export POSITION=2 && pm2 start index.js --name 'rectangel-generaror-test'
scripts.autorun: export FREQ=20 && export POSITION=1 && pm2 start index.js --name 'rectangel-generaror'

author: Volodymyr Tymets
